component.description: Carousel is a multi purpose component to display a set of data or general content with slide effects.
component.attributes:
&data_component_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
circular false java.lang.Boolean false Sets continuous scrolling. Default is false.
vertical false java.lang.Boolean false Sets vertical scrolling. Default is false
autoPlayInterval false java.lang.Integer 0 Sets the time in milliseconds to have Carousel start scrolling automatically after being initialized. Default is 0.
pageLinks false java.lang.Integer 3 Defines number of pageLinks of paginator.
effect false java.lang.String Name of the animation effect slide or fade. Default is slide.
easing false java.lang.String Name of the animation effect. Default is easeInOutCirc.
effectDuration false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MIN_VALUE Sets the speed of the scrolling animation in milliseconds. Default is 500.
dropdownTemplate false java.lang.String {page} Text format of the pager dropdown elements. Default is "{page}".
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the main container.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container.
itemStyle false java.lang.String Inline style of each item container.
itemStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of each item container.
headerText false java.lang.String Shortcut for header facet.
footerText false java.lang.String Shortcut for footer facet.
